title: Download Video
text: One Direction Detail New Album, Release Anthemic 'Infinity' 01:00 One Direction have revealed the title for their fifth album — Made in the A.M. — and have set November 13th as the new album's release date.The boy band announced Made in the A.M. via a Twitter video. In the clip, they also revealed that new track "Infinity" — written by the same team behind...
